title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 210-6.2 - Reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 210-6.2 - Reporting

State Regulations

The engine manufacturer must maintain sufficient records
as required by California Code of Regulations, title 13, section
2446
(see

Table 1, section
200.9
of this Title) regarding
their production-line testing program. These records are not required to be
submitted to the department unless specifically requested, in writing, by the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
210-6.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
